headline: Micron Expands AI Chip Capabilities With Faster, More Efficient DRAM for Next-Gen Devices
summary: On Tuesday, Micron Technology, Inc (NASDAQ:MU) announced it shipped samples of its 1γ (1-gamma), sixth-generation (10nm-class) DRAM node-based DDR5 memory designed for next-generation CPUs to ecosystem partners and select customers. This 1γ DRAM milestone builds on Micron’s previous 1α (1-alpha) and 1β (1-beta) DRAM node leadership to deliver innovations that will power future computing platforms from the cloud to industrial and consumer applications to Edge AI devices like AI PCs, smartphones,
